description: Archi is a cloud-based architecture collaboration tool for designers and firms. We designed and developed a responsive web platform with a clean UI and multi-user dashboard system.
Our UX approach focused on seamless blueprint uploads, live editing, and integration with industry-standard tools like AutoCAD and SketchUp.
We implemented user-specific workflows and cloud storage, enabling real-time sync and commenting across team members.
Security and role-based access controls were also integrated to support enterprise usage.
We delivered a scalable React + Node.js based SPA with Firebase for real-time updates.
The architecture emphasized performance, clean visual hierarchy, and intuitive navigation for non-technical users.
